summary: This bill, H.R. 4386, amends the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act to clarify entrance privileges for vehicles using the America the Beautiful interagency pass. It specifies the pass covers entrance fees and standard amenity recreation fees for the passholder and passengers in a private vehicle, or, for motorcycles, both the passholder and passengers and an additional motorcycle with passengers. The bill aims to define the use of the America the Beautiful pass, ensuring it covers fees for recreational lands and waters.
